---
name: example-greeting
description: A simple skill for greeting users in a friendly, structured way.
---

# Greeting Skill

## When to Use
- At the start of a conversation
- When a user says hello or introduces themselves

## Instructions

1. Acknowledge the user warmly
2. Introduce yourself briefly
3. Ask how you can help

## Output Format

Always greet in this structure:
- Greeting: [warm greeting]
- Introduction: [one sentence about your role]
- Offer: [ask how to help]
